programmes.show_description: Wagga Truck Towing battle impending rain to retrieve a twenty-two tonne cattle truck that's rolled off a waterlogged farm track.
Reality series. Art struggles to negotiate a melting ice crossing, Alex faces a mud-covered mountain, and Lisa and Darrell put their company's future on the line.
Just outside Newcastle, Kev is sent to rescue a wheelie bin delivery truck that has got stuck. With torrential rain forecast, this job is turning into a recovery nightmare.
Following the men and women of the heavy recovery business. In Hertfordshire, rookie op Euan is tasked with rescuing a ten-tonne rigid - one wrong move could end his rescue mission.

Your one-stop-shop for all things cruise; bringing you the hottest destinations, ground-breaking ships and the latest deals to ensure your next cruise holiday is your greatest one!
A daily round-up of showbiz news and gossip from around the world, focusing on celebrities, movies, music and entertainment.
A group of snowplough drivers and vehicle rescue patrols dedicate themselves, all day every day, to keeping Britain's roads safe when big freezes strike.
Lisa and Jim find themselves slipping and sliding through the pitch black on the trail of a runaway 4x4. Their suspect seems to know rural Nottinghamshire like the back of his hand .
A dangerous driver who's breached his restraining order leads the interceptors on the pursuit to end all pursuits.
Western starring Alan Ladd and Mona Freeman. A gunman poses as a wealthy rancher's long-lost son in an attempt to steal his fortune. (1951)

Western starring Alan Ladd and Mona Freeman. A gunman poses as a wealthy rancher's long-lost son in an attempt to steal his fortune. (1951)
Western adventure starring Dean Martin and Robert Mitchum. A gambler and a gun-toting priest set out to find a killer who has picked off members of a lynch mob. (1968)

Western adventure starring Dean Martin and Robert Mitchum. A gambler and a gun-toting priest set out to find a killer who has picked off members of a lynch mob. (1968)
A vintage steam locomotive worth £250,000 is hauled from the Peak District to its new home in Cornwall, negotiating tight roads, hill climbs and impatient road users along the way.
Officers give high-speed pursuit to a van with cloned plates which smashes through traffic near Leeds, and on the A1 a driver claims a mechanical fault caused him to crash.
Action-packed reality series. A reverse ramming sends Chris reaching for german shepherd Ronny, and Lee is confronted by a particularly mouthy motorist.
Interceptor Spike takes the lead against a runaway car thief in one of the most challenging pursuits ever. Liam investigates a drug dealing gang.
A driver who ditches his car to run off, ends up on the receiving end of PC Brian's taser! And the search of a suspect vehicle reveals possible burglary tools.
Officers are called to a fight in a takeaway and four are arrested; a group of people abandon their car after a hit and run; bouncers are racially abused by passerby.
A woman makes a desperate attempt to frame her friend right in front of deputies. A driver's assortment of containers raises some questions.
Fleeing suspects risk their safety by hiding in a dangerous swamp. For one driver, a broken truck turns out to be the start of a very long list of problems.
New York teen John Alite starts running errands for mobsters, becoming a Mafia hitman for John Gotti. But when the house of cards tumbles, John must choose between family and the Mob.
Truckworks trainee Bryce is sent to assist heavy recovery specialist Lyel recover a rolled semi-trailer that's closed down a rural freight route into the South Australian town of Burra.
Reality series. Todd must think outside the box, Alex races against the clock, and just getting home proves a struggle for Darrell and Lisa.
A toppled tanker loaded with liquid chicken guts needs rescuing, a refrigerated truck stranded on a busy road is leaking water everywhere, and  an artic has smashed into two lampposts.
Alpha Recovery send a crew to a challenging, energy-sapping recovery: a fuel tanker has rolled down a steep, muddy hill and landed on its side. A huge digger is needed to flip it over.

The pursuit of a white van tearing up the turf proves to be a family affair, and a two-year-old German shepherd cross named Titan earns his spurs.
Dog handler Darren calls on all his powers of persuasion to try and end a rooftop stand-off, and Steve is forced to use his pepper spray on a suspect.
Jacko is hot on the heels of a speeding Mazda, while the interceptors raid a cannabis farm. Canine cop Shadow sniffs out stolen goods.
Officers race to catch a reckless joyrider who refuses to stop. As the cops close in, the suspects run for it after crashing the car and it bursts into flames.
A shocking hit and run leaves an elderly driver with serious head injuries, and a rude driver's outburst brings him under scrutiny which he could live to regret.
Cops spot a car speeding by the Tyne, and when they pull it over, a search uncovers a crack pipe. And PC Martain Anderson stakes out a suspected drug driver.
A Paul Gascoigne lookalike is pulled over for speeding and bullying other drivers, and  a reckless driver reacts to being stopped with a foul-mouthed tirade.

Joel McCrea, Randolph Scott and Mariette Hartley star as a group who try to steal gold from a mine in the state of New Mexico. (1962)

U.S. Naval Officer Lemar Burton is arrested with five kilos of cocaine through the Bogota airport. Now he must survive one of Colombia's most brutal prisons.
